claim: Tim Rice worked on King David with Alan Menken.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He is best known for his collaborations with Andrew Lloyd Webber , with whom he wrote Joseph and the Amazing Technicolor Dreamcoat , Jesus Christ Superstar , and Evita ; with Bj√∂rn Ulvaeus and Benny Andersson of ABBA , with whom he wrote Chess ; for additional songs for the 2011 West End revival of The Wizard of Oz ; and for his work for Walt Disney Studios with Alan Menken  (  Aladdin , Beauty and the Beast , King David  )  , Elton John  (  The Lion King , Aida , The Road to El Dorado  )  and Ennio Morricone .
